pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual core 64-bit x86
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.6 discrete GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad core 64-bit x86
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.6 discrete GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
